28.eng-name: The Book of Oaths, Muharibin, Qasas (Retaliation), and Diyat (Blood Money)

hadiths.text: Abdullah (b. Mas'ud) reported:Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) having said: No person who is killed unjustly, but the share of (this offence of his also) falls upon the first son of Adam, for he was the first to introduce killing

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيَانِ إِثْمِ مَنْ سَنَّ الْقَتْلَ
chapter.eng-name: The sin of the one who set the precedent of killing
